name: Jurriaan Rot
content: Jurriaan Rot I am an associate professor at Radboud University. I am interested in theoretical computer science in general, and coalgebra, automata learning and verification in particular. Previously, I received my PhD degree at Leiden University, under supervision of Marcello Bonsangue, Jan Rutten and Frank de Boer. My email address is jurriaan.rot@ru.nl
